TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProtectedProviderSettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement

Docs.summary: Represents a group of configuration elements that configure the providers for the `<configProtectedData>` configuration section.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedProviderSettings"> class.
Gets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"> collection that represents the properties of the providers for the protected configuration data.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"> that represents the properties of the providers for the protected configuration data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedProviderSettings.Providers%2A> property to access the properties of the providers for protected configuration data.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"> objects that represent the properties of the providers for the protected configuration data.
Docs.value: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"> objects that represent the properties of the providers for the protected configuration data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use this property to access the properties of the providers for protected configuration data instead of the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedProviderSettings.Properties%2A> property.
